## CommonDirectiveTransformer

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/plugins/plugin-runtime/builtin/CommonDirectiveTransformer.ts" sourceLine="24" packageName="commandkit" />

Common directive transformer plugin is a compiler plugin that transforms directives to higher-order functions.

```ts title="Signature"
class CommonDirectiveTransformer extends CompilerPlugin<CommonDirectiveTransformerOptions> {
    activate(ctx: CompilerPluginRuntime) => Promise<void>;
    deactivate(ctx: CompilerPluginRuntime) => Promise<void>;
    transform(params: PluginTransformParameters) => Promise<MaybeFalsey<TransformedResult>>;
}
```
